name: Moonvania
description:
Instructions:

Arrow keys to move

Space/up arrow to jump (Hold space for longer jumps)

X to run (Jump while running to jump even higher!)

Z to interact

R to restart if you get stuck

Lore

You are an alien living on the moon. One day you come across a space wizard who sends you off on a fetch quest! Find the key, find the potions, unlock the final level!

Credits

Art and code made by Fahim (Popstuff)
Music by Aaraf
This demo wouldn't have been possible without the stencyl community's support
